text: Bityo, iryo (dini ry’Ubuyisilamu ry’Intumwa zose) ube ari ryo uhamagarira (abantu), kandi ukomeze utungane nk’uko wabitegetswe, ntuzanakurikire irari ryabo. Unavuge uti “Nemera ibyo Allah yahishuye mu bitabo (byahawe Intumwa), kandi nategetswe gukoresha ubutabera muri mwe. Allah ni We Nyagasani wacu akaba ari na we Nyagasani wanyu. Dufite ibikorwa byacu namwe mukagira ibyanyu. Nta mpaka zikwiye kuba hagati yacu namwe. Allah azaduhuriza hamwe twese (aducire imanza). Kandi iwe ni ho garukiro (ryacu twese)
